name: The Frail
description:
Due to some tension with your family back home you have decided to go camping despite the winter snow in order to cool off. You've set up camp and begun to settle in for the night before trying to get some sleep. Restlessness keeps you awake so you decide to rebuild your campfire in order to try and occupy your mind and brush off the thoughts troubling you.

https://freesound.org/people/Bosk1/sounds/144083/ - Wind sound
https://freesound.org/people/dersuperanton/sounds/435845/ - Flashlight sound
https://freesound.org/people/duckduckpony/sounds/204024/ - Flesh impact sound
https://freesound.org/people/Spectre_of_Pain/sounds/338134/ - Creepy sound
https://freesound.org/people/Huggy13ear/sounds/138959/ - Interact sound
https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270461/ - Gate open sound

PLEASE NOTE:

I did not make the majority of models used in this game

The game also includes some swearing and violence

Play in the dark with lights off for the best experience
